item.title: Kate add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Kate add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Love is finding that the things you like best about yourself are not in you at all, but in the person who completes you" -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Kate add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kate add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "And he said unto me: Because of thy faith in Christ, whom thou hast never before heard nor seen. And many years pass away before he shall manifest himself in the flesh; wherefore, go to, thy faith hath made thee whole." -- Anonymous

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "I regret nothing. There have been things I missed, but I ask no questions, because I have loved it, such as it has been, even the moments of emptiness, even the unanswered-and that I loved it, that is the unanswered in my life." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Kate add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kate add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Kate add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kate add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whatever you are, be a good one." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kate add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kate add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kate add a quote by Suzanne Weyn
item.description: "Your life is an occasion. Rise to it." -- Suzanne Weyn

item.title: Kate add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Kate add a quote by What Dreams May Come
item.description: "What some folks call impossible, is just stuff they haven't seen before." -- What Dreams May Come

item.title: Kate add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Kate add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Kate add a quote by Paul J. Meyer
item.description: "What you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe and enthusiastically act upon must inevitably come to pass. " -- Paul J. Meyer

item.title: Kate add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kate add a quote by Alan Bennett
item.description: "The best moments in reading are when you come across something - a thought, a feeling, a way of looking at things - which you had thought special and particular to you. And now, here it is, set down by someone else, a person you have never met, someone even who is long dead. And it is as if a hand has come out, and taken yours" -- Alan Bennett

item.title: Kate add a quote by John Grisham
item.description: "Don't compromise yourself - you're all you have." -- John Grisham

item.title: Kate add a quote by Sheri Dew
item.description: "None of us come to this earth to gain our worth; we brought it with us." -- Sheri Dew

item.title: Kate add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Whether you say you can't or you can, you're right." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Kate add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kate add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you are now." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Kate add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I wish I could freeze this moment, right here, right now and live in it forever." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Kate add a quote by Nancy E. Turner
item.description: "Children are a burden to a mother, but not the way a heavy box is to a mule. Our children weight hard on my heart, and thinking about them growing up honest and healthy, or just living to grow up at all, makes a load in my chest that is bigger than the safe at the bank,and more valuable to me than all the gold inside it." -- Nancy E. Turner

item.title: Kate add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always thought insanity would be a dark, bitter feeling, but it is drenching and delicious if you really roll around in it." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Kate add a quote by Emily Giffin
item.description: "...love is the sum of our choices, the strength of our commitments, the ties that bind us together." -- Emily Giffin
